RequestBody.description: This is the payment request with the amount and reference id.

destination_account_id.description: This is the account ID that will be associated with the payment. You can get your account ID information via our [Get User Info API : /v3/user](../V3/Indonesia#operation/getUserInfo)

bank_type.description: Please specify the bank that you want your customer to transfer to. Currently we only support BNI and BRI for this specific payment method.

display_name.description: Name to be displayed in the corresponding bank system such as ATM confirmation screen. If empty, it will be given a default value.

FixedVirtualAccountPaymentObject.description: This is the payment object that we will be returning.
